RTK # Specialized shelter designed to optimize the signal reception for RTK robots. # Compatible with various satellite navigations. Originally designed for the Segway Navimow robot but works for all wireless robots. The shelter’s roof can be tilted so you can gain easy access to the robot. # • RTK Compatibility # • Simple Installation # • Roof with UV-Protection # • Included Storm Anchors # FEATURES: # SKU: 57504114 # ”The ultimate garage # for wireless robots”. # AM ROBOTS presents the new Navi Home # The Garage especially designed for RTK-Robots. Navi Home Size: 77cm x 72cm x 48cm # 8 # Aluminium garages All garages have 2-years warranty. No maintenance is needed, however, we recommend occasionally giving the garage or shelter a thorough clean. Size: 60cm x 42cm x 80cm AM Garage 1 - Medium Size: 77cm x 45,5cm x 103cm AM Garage 1 - Large # Medium SKU: 38501696 # Large SKU: 38501697 # AM Garage 1 # Tinted roof for extra sun protection. # • With see through, black shaded roof # • Great value for money # Universal Garage # Flip it open and access from the top. # • Tilt the top # • Installed in minutes # • Pegs to attach the garage are included Size: 82cm x 70cm x 46cm Universal Garage # SKU: 38969998 # Robot Shelter # One piece shelter. # • Installed in minutes # • Comes in one pice # • Pegs to attach the shelter are included Size: 39cm x 75cm x 55cm Robot Shelter # SKU: 3899999 # 9 # Ambrogio L400 # Only fits L400. # • Strong build # • Can be customized # • Standard colours: Black and gold Size: 135cm x 130cm x 55cm Ambrogio L400 # SKU: 38989998 Blog post - 4 reasons to use a garage for your robot mower # C-Home # Compatible with the Ceora Automower. # • Protects the robot from overheating # • Available with an extra storage box that comes with an external power plug Size: 163cm x 142cm x 71cm C-Home # SKU: 38501699 # BIGMOW Sponsor home # For sports clubs. # • Strong build # • Sponsorship options # • Suits the BIGMOW docking station Size: 159cm x 150cm x 66cm BIGMOW # SKU: 38999998 # 10 # 11 # AM Hybrid Grass # AM Hybrid grass gives natural grass the opportunity to recover and grow through the net. AM Hybrid grass provides a natural look while hiding bald patches in the garden. Use it on steep areas in the garden where the robot tends to slide down. Ideal for the docking station where the grass is worn away by the robot - perfect for places where the grass does not grow. The Hybrid grass makes sure you do not have to worry about the robot getting stuck anywhere on the lawn, allowing the robot to cut the entire lawn all year round. • Protects the lawn • Invisible in 3-4 weeks • Gives the robot a better grip • Use it by the docking station • Made of: Synthetic grass # FEATURES: # 80cm x 80cm SKU: 57504114 # 2m x 2m SKU: 57504135 # 20m x 1m SKU: 57504142 The natural grass grows through the Hybrid Grass with the roots well protected underneath the net. Max speed@3600rmp # • Noise specifications: 72 dB/a # • Efficient: UP to 600m/h # • Depth from 1-5cm underground # • 180 degrees handle tilting # • Takes cable up to 6mm in Diameter # • Meter-counter included # Terra 800 Cable Machine # SKU: 90973596 Fuel-driven cable machine # 15 # Designed by professionals to optimize the # work of robotic mower installers. # • Powerful 4-stroke Honda GXH50 Engine, 2,1 HP # • Installs 600 meters per hour # • Wire depth 4-6 cm underground # • Ergonomic handle # • Cable size up to 6 mm # • Heavy-duty blades for all underground obstacles # PWM 600MH # Cable Machine # SKU: 90979796 # The best battery-driven cable machine for # robot mower installations. # • Brushless 80/82V Lithium-Ion battery electric motor # • Silent and sustainable installation # • Emission-free operation # • Ergonomic handle # • Can take up to 70% steep slopes # • Heavy duty blades for all underground obstacles # PWM 600MH-LI # Cable Machine # SKU: 90978896 Fuel-driven cable machine Batteri-driven cable machine # 16 # These Installation Kits contain an # all-in-one solution for your robot mower installation. # • Comes in: X-Small, Small, Medium, Large and X-Large # • Every kit contains a installation ruler to measure distances # Installation Kits # S SKU: 33899789 # XS SKU: 33899790 # M SKU: 33899791 # XL SKU: 33899792 # L SKU: 33899793 X-Small Small Medium Large X-Large 100 meter (2,7mm) cable, 100 bio pegs, 2 scotchlok, 3 docking station connectors 150 meter (2,7mm) cable, 300 bio pegs, 5 scotchlok, 5 docking station connectors 250 meter (2,7mm) cable, 400 bio pegs, 5 scotchlok, 5 docking station connectors 400 meter (2,7mm) cable, 600 bio pegs, 5 scotchlok, 5 docking station connectors 500 meter (2,7mm) cable, 800 bio pegs, 5 scotchlok, 5 docking station connectors # Repair any broken cable with this complete set of # cable, plastic pegs and connectors. # • Comes in: 5m, 25m and 50m - with 2,7mm cable or in 5m and 25m - with 3,4mm cable # Repair Kits 5 meter 25 meter 50 meter 5 meter (2,7mm) cable, 10 plastic pegs, 5 scotchlok 25 meter (2,7mm) cable, 10 plastic pegs, 5 scotchlok 50 meter (2,7mm) cable, 10 plastic pegs, 5 scotchlok # 5m SKU: 45509738 # 50m SKU: 45509743 # 25m SKU: 18270506 Can be done with 3,4mm cable or 3,8mm cable. # 17 # Robot ReDirect # 10 pcs SKU: 81939774 # 1 pc SKU: 81939778 # Exclude or include areas with a simple twis. # • Use 1 unit per area # • IP67 waterproof and frost resistant (-18 °C), so it can stay outside year after year. # • Screw it into the ground, and simply twist it to activate. # • Tested on Husqvarna, Ambrogio, STIHL, Robomow, Worx, Cup Cadet, AL-KO and other model robot mowers # • Include or exclude an area with a twist Choose where to cut # 18 At AM ROBOTS we develop our blades with the highest concern for safety. The blades are made of stainless steel, with an extra hard coating, designed to minimize the chance of breakage if the blade hits a rock or hard branch during cutting. Stainless steel’s strength, resistance to corrosion and low maintenance makes it the ideal material for our blades. Furthermore, we appreciate its long lifespan and that the material is 100% recyclable. • Developed with a high concern for safety • Stainless steel • 100% recyclable # Blades # 19 # HUSQVARNA / GARDENA / SEGWAY # • Quiet mowing # • Material: stainless steel 9 pcs Parkside Reversible # Parkside Reversible blades # 9 pcs SKU: 39584572 # NEW # BOSCH # 26 The main principles of robot lawnmower installations are the same no matter the garden. But the tools used for the installation, or repair, vary. At AM ROBOTS we continuously try to evolve and meet the demands, by revolutionizing our product range. Supplying worldwide installers the best tools in the industry. • Pliers • Trackers • Cleaning tools • Heat Gun • Tools for every installation # Tools # 27 1 pc Basic Tracker # SKU: 60503597 1 pc AM Wirestripper 5in1 # The multi-function feature means that you only need one tool. # • Stripping # • Crimping # • Cutting # • Adjustable to fit any type and size of cable # AM Wirestripper 5in1 # SKU: 60503581 1 pc AM Pro Tracker Plus # AM Pro Tracker Plus can locate wire breaks down to a depth of # 2 meters. Can be used on partial breaks. # • Customized display that improves useability # • Multiple track options # • USB Rechargeable # • The detected cable length can be up to 2 km # • Earth-Rod included # AM Pro Tracker Plus # SKU: 60509397 # The Basic Cable Tracker works for cables above ground. # • Capable of tracing cable breaks, such as single-core, 2-core, or multi-core cable # • The detected cable length can be up to 10 km # Basic Tracker # 28 # MAX Jet Cleaning tool # Helps removing the grass and dirt buildup # under the mower quickly. Air blower # • POWER 7,2V 160W # • 4.0 AH Battery built in 21700 cell # • 2 Nozzles stepless speed # • MAX air flow: 30 min # • MAX air volecity: 24 m/s # • Configuration: Type C charging port # Cleaning Kit # Text Text here # • Text # NEW # 29 # AM Portable Heat Gun # AM ROBOTS presents the best tool for any repair or installation of # robot lawnmower cable. This product has been designed to make repairs on boundary cable in any garden at any location. It is possible to do 30 repairs on one battery charge. The heat gun runs on 18-volt power and the 4AH battery will provide you with a powerful heat blow. The max temperature is 550°C which gives the perfect heat needed for all heat shrink connectors. # • Cordless with lithium battery # • Repair over 30 boundary wires on one charge # • Used for heat shrink connectors # • Works for all robot mower cables # • Cooling system # FEATURES: # • Battery: 4AH lithium battery # • Power: 18v DC # • Rated current: 15A # • Max temp: 550 °C # • Max airflow: 200L/min # SKU: 62691699 Perfect for any repair or installation Video - How to use the Heat Gun with the connectors from AM Robots # 30 At AM ROBOTS we develop our connectors with two subjects in focus. First of we need them to function with a strong connection and long lifespan. Second, we are aiming to facilitate quick and easy solutions for our dedicated installers all over the world. With our big assortment we have connectors that fit every need when doing an installation or repair of a robot mower. • Strong connections • Quick and easy solutions • Used for Installations and repairs # Connectors # 31 10 pcs | 50 pcs Pro Heat Shrink kit # This kit contains heat shrink connectors and heat shrink tubes. # • For underground connections # • Perfect conductivity # • Easy to shrink # Pro Heat Shrink kit # 50 pcs SKU: 53689475 # 10 pcs SKU: 53599474 10 pcs | 50 pcs Guide Cable Heat Shrink kit # This kit contains heat shrink connectors and heat shrink tubes. # • Can be used for up to 3 cable connections in one # • Perfect conductivity # • Easy to shrink # Guide Cable Heat Shrink kit # 50 pcs SKU: 53972375 # 10 pcs SKU: 53972374 1 pc Heat Shrink kit - 1mm² # 36 At AM ROBOTS, we offer a diverse range of pegs designed to meet the needs of all our customers. Whether you prefer regular or extreme plastic pegs, docking station pegs, or environmentally friendly biodegradable pegs, we have options for everyone. Our commitment to continuous improvement means that all our pegs undergo enhancements, and our latest extreme pegs are now more robust than ever, providing increased durability to prevent breakage. • Plastic pegs • Bio pegs • Docking station pegs # Pegs # 37 # Text # • Text # • Text # • Text # New pegs here Text # SKU: 47470139 # Coming soon... # Bio Anchor pegs # Comes in two sizes and two colors # 38 100 pcs Biodegradable Pegs # SKU: 40690124 100 pcs Extreme Biodegradable Pegs # SKU: 40690126 # Extreme Biodegradable Pegs - # 8,5cm # It is time to change to eco-friendly pegs for robot installations. # Installation, with only 1 cable in the ground over time. # • A better solution for the environment # • Anchors better into the ground # • They decompose after 1-2 years # • Low cost # • Suitable for soft soil # • 100 pcs per bag # Biodegradable Pegs - # 8,5cm # They make it easier to remove old cable and leave a clean # installation, with only 1 cable in the ground over time. # • Green, therefore easier to hide # • They decompose after 1-2 years # • Approved by EU regulations # • A better solution for the environment # • 100 pcs per bag Protect the environment by thinking green. Use our bio pegs and minimize the plastic waste while making it easier to remove broken cable in the future. # 39 100 pcs Plastic Pegs # SKU: 40690123 100 pcs Extreme Plastic Pegs # SKU: 40690125 # Extreme Plastic Pegs -
